currentAddress:
{
 streetAddress: person.residentialAddress.street?:"",
cityName: person.residentialAddress?.city,
stateName: person.residentialAddress.state?:"",
countryName: person.residentialAddress.country,
postalCode: (person.residentialAddress.zipCode).toString(),
lat: check (person.residentialAddress?.latitude).ensureType(),
lng: check (person.residentialAddress?.longitude).ensureType(),
locationType: person.residentialAddress.addressType?:"",
verified: person.residentialAddress.isVerified?:false,
updatedOn: person.residentialAddress.lastUpdated?:"",
landmarks: person.residentialAddress.nearbyLandmarks?:[],
main: person.residentialAddress.isPrimary?:false,
timezone: person.residentialAddress.timeZone?:"" 
}
homeAddress:
{
 streetAddress: person?.permanentAddress?.street?:"",
cityName: person?.permanentAddress?.city,
stateName: person?.permanentAddress?.state?:"",
countryName: person?.permanentAddress?.country?:"",
postalCode: (person?.permanentAddress?.zipCode?:0).toString(),
lat: check (person?.permanentAddress?.latitude).ensureType(),
lng: check (person?.permanentAddress?.longitude).ensureType(),
locationType: person?.permanentAddress?.addressType?:"",
verified: person?.permanentAddress?.isVerified?:false,
updatedOn: person?.permanentAddress?.lastUpdated?:"",
landmarks: person?.permanentAddress?.nearbyLandmarks?:[],
main: person?.permanentAddress?.isPrimary?:false,
timezone: person?.permanentAddress?.timeZone?:"" 
}
studentDocs:
from var documentsItem in person?.documents ?: []
 select {
 documentType: documentsItem.documentType,
number: documentsItem.documentNumber,
country: documentsItem.issuingCountry,
validUntil: documentsItem.expiryDate,
issueDate: documentsItem.issueDate?:"",
verified: documentsItem.isVerified?:false,
verifiedBy: documentsItem.verificationSource?:"",
comments: documentsItem.remarks?:""
}
emergency:
{
 contactName: person?.emergencyContact?.name?:"",
contactDetails: person?.emergencyContact?.contacts?:[],
relation: person?.emergencyContact?.relationship?:"",
contactAddress: person?.emergencyContact?.address?:"",
primaryContact: person?.emergencyContact?.isPrimary?:false,
lastContacted: person?.emergencyContact?.lastContactDate?:"",
contactPersonId: person?.emergencyContact?.contactId?:"" 
}
healthRecord:
{
 blood: person?.healthInfo?.bloodGroup?:"",
allergyInfo: person?.healthInfo?.allergies?:[],
currentMedications: person?.healthInfo?.medications,
insuranceStatus: person?.healthInfo?.isInsured?:false,
insurer: person?.healthInfo?.insuranceProvider?:"",
policyId: person?.healthInfo?.policyNumber?:"",
conditions: person?.healthInfo?.medicalConditions?:[],
checkupDate: person?.healthInfo?.lastCheckupDate?:"",
doctorName: person?.healthInfo?.primaryPhysician?:"",
disabilityStatus: person?.healthInfo?.hasDisability?:false,
specialNeeds: person?.healthInfo?.accommodationNeeds?:[] 
}
finances:
{
 paymentPreference: person?.financialInfo?.preferredPayment?:"CASH",
accountId: person?.financialInfo?.accountNumber,
bank: person?.financialInfo?.bankName,
scholarship: person?.financialInfo?.scholarshipAmount,
tuition: person?.financialInfo?.tuitionFee?:0.0,
outstandingAmount: person?.financialInfo?.outstandingBalance?:0.0,
loanTaken: person?.financialInfo?.hasLoan?:false,
loanProvider: person?.financialInfo?.loanProvider?:"",
monthlyPaymentAmount: person?.financialInfo?.monthlyPayment?:0.0,
payments: person?.financialInfo?.paymentHistory?:[],
maxCredit: person?.financialInfo?.creditLimit?:0.0,
paymentStanding: person?.financialInfo?.paymentStatus?:"SUSPENDED" 
}
education:
from var academicHistoryItem in person?.academicHistory ?: []
 select {
 school: academicHistoryItem?.institutionName?:"",
gradePoint: academicHistoryItem.gpa?:0.0,
specialization: academicHistoryItem.major?:"",
completionYear: academicHistoryItem.graduationYear?:0,
completedCourses: academicHistoryItem.courses?:[],
courseGrades: academicHistoryItem.grades?:[],
degree: academicHistoryItem.degreeType?:"",
certificate: academicHistoryItem.certificationType?:"",
verificationStatus: academicHistoryItem.transcriptVerified?:"",
academicLevel: academicHistoryItem.academicStanding?:"",
achievements: academicHistoryItem.honors?:[],
extracurriculars: academicHistoryItem.activities?:[]
}
abilities:
from var skillsItem in person?.skills ?: []
 select {
 skillName: skillsItem.name?:"",
level: skillsItem.proficiencyLevel?:0,
experiencePeriod: skillsItem?.experience?:"",
certification: skillsItem.certificationName?:"",
issuer: skillsItem.issuingOrganization?:"",
acquisitionDate: skillsItem.dateAcquired?:"",
expirationDate: skillsItem.expiryDate?:"",
verified: skillsItem.isVerified?:false,
projects: skillsItem.relatedProjects?:[],
testimonials: skillsItem.endorsements?:[]
}
enrolledCourses:
from var coursesItem in person?.college?.courses ?: []
 select {
 courseId: coursesItem?.id,
courseName: coursesItem?.name,
code: coursesItem.courseCode,
desc: coursesItem?.description,
creditHours: coursesItem.credits,
courseDuration: coursesItem.duration,
possibleGrades: check (coursesItem.allowedGrades).cloneWithType(),
professors: from var professorsItem in coursesItem?.professors ?: []
 select {
 id: professorsItem.id,
firstName: professorsItem.firstName,
lastName: professorsItem?.lastName,
specializations: professorsItem?.specializations,
gradesAssigned: professorsItem.gradesAssigned,
department: {
 departmentName: professorsItem.department?.departmentName?:"",
status: professorsItem.department?.status,
facultyCount: professorsItem.department?.facultyCount?:0,
specializations: professorsItem.department?.specializations?:[],
budget: professorsItem.department?.budget?:0.0,
established: professorsItem.department?.established?:"",
headOfDepartment: professorsItem.department?.headOfDepartment,
programs: professorsItem.department?.programs,
buildingLocation: professorsItem.department?.buildingLocation,
departmentCode: professorsItem.department?.departmentCode,
studentCount: professorsItem.department?.studentCount,
researchFocus: professorsItem.department?.researchFocus,
website: professorsItem.department?.website 
}
}
}
